title: Tamil Nadu: Chennai’s 'last Jew' fights for place in India’s history
content:
Davvid Levi has been documenting the history of his family and that of other
Jews in India's Chennai city.

title: Women take the lead in India’s Republic Day parade
content:
Every year, the country celebrates the day its constitution came into effect
with a grand spectacle.

title: India v England: Ollie Pope ton gives tourists hope in Hyderabad
content:
Ollie Pope's magnificent century, his best innings for England, keeps the
tourists alive after three days of the first Test against India in Hyderabad.

title: India calls Pakistan's claim of targeted killings 'false'
content:
Islamabad on Thursday accused India of killing two of its citizens on its soil
in 2023.

title: Umar Khalid: Indian activist languishes in jail without bail or trial
content:
Umar Khalid, who was arrested three years ago for alleged involvement in
riots, is still waiting for a trial.

title: Adani Ports: The Tamil Nadu villagers taking on a billionaire's port plan
content:
Locals in 100 villages of Tamil Nadu state are fighting the expansion of a
port owned by Gautam Adani.

title: Bopanna, 43, becomes oldest tennis world number one
content:
Rohan Bopanna becomes the oldest tennis world number one aged 43 after he and
Matthew Ebden reach the Australian Open doubles semi-finals.

title: Watch: Crowds at India's new Ram temple in Ayodhya day after opening
content:
The grand temple dedicated to the Hindu God Ram was inaugurated by Prime
Minister Narendra Modi on Monday.

title: Ayodhya Ram Mandir: India PM Modi inaugurates Hindu temple on razed Babri mosque site
content:
The rituals were led by PM Narendra Modi, while opposition leaders and some
Hindu seers stayed away.

title: Sony calls off merger with India media giant Zee
content:
Zee considers legal action after Sony ends the planned $10bn merger of the
firms' Indian operations.

title: Watch: Indian PM Modi inaugurates temple in Ayodhya
content: The opening of the grand temple comes ahead of India's general elections.

title: India v Afghanistan: Two super overs as Rohit Sharma hits record century in T20 series win
content:
Captain Rohit Sharma hits a record fifth T20 international century as India
secure a 3-0 series win over Afghanistan after two super overs.

title: Man locked in SpiceJet plane toilet for over an hour
content:
The passenger got stuck inside the lavatory of a SpiceJet flight after the
door malfunctioned mid-journey.

title: Flight cancellations: Airport chaos angers Indians as fog hits travel
content:

the Mumbai airport tarmac.

title: India v England: Relaxed, fit tourists look for series win for the ages
content:
England's record in India is better than most, but merely staying competitive
will be a fine achievement, writes Stephan Shemilt.

title: Ayodhya: Temple to open at India’s religious fault-line
content:
The new temple in Ayodhya has stirred up memories for the community caught up
in 1992's violence.

title: Kashmir's rare snowless winter sets off alarm bells
content:
Experts say that the absence of snowfall this winter will lead to water
scarcity and derail the economy.

title: Lakshadweep: Can India's 'alternative Maldives' handle mass tourism?
content:
Indian PM Modi's recent visit to Lakshadweep could spark a tourist surge - but
is the island chain ready?

title: Gujarat boat capsize victims 'not given life jackets'
content:
Parents of students who died after a boat capsized in India's Gujarat state
allege negligence by authorities.

title: What Rahul Gandhi's march means for India election
content:
The Congress leader's cross-country march began with hope, but analysts doubt
its electoral impact.

title: Agatha Christie: The Indian hotel murder that inspired the queen of crime
content:
The sensational case, which made global headlines, is said to have influenced
Christie's first book.

content:

content:
Scammers in Bihar state promised to pay huge sums of money to men to get
childless women pregnant.

title: Maldives: Maldivians debate India's 'boycott' of their nation
content:

comments about India's PM Modi.

title: Plane gets jammed under bridge in India
content:

title: Intruder jumps on table in Indian parliament
content:
Lawmakers said two men jumped into the well of the house from the visitors'
gallery.

title: Moment worker is pulled from collapsed tunnel
content:
Fourty-one Indian workers are finally rescued from a tunnel that partially
caved in after a landslide.

tunnel since 12 November.

title: Andhra Pradesh: Drone footage shows aftermath of deadly India train crash
content:

officials say.

title: India flash floods: More than 100 missing in Sikkim state
content:
